original_title: Burn the Floor: The New Show: Floor Play
overview: Choreographer Jason Gilkison picks up right where the first Burn the Floor show left off, turning up the heat with this sizzling production in which his award-winning troupe demonstrates just how hot ballroom dancing can be. Highlights include "The Latin Quarter," where the cha-cha, rumba and salsa blend into one steamy spectacle of motion, and "Harlem's Hot Night at the Savoy," where the Lindy and the fox-trot are showcased in inspired fashion.
title: Burn the Floor: The New Show: Floor Play
